patterns: I feel bad all the time
responses: It's okay to feel sad sometimes but if this is happening constantly you should seek proffessional help.

Set small goals and and try to achieve them

patterms: How to be a better person?

Be really aware of what are you feeding your mind.We are average of people we surround ourselves with. This feeding to the mind can be anything from news to casual conversations or what you see in social media

patterms: Why I'm too dependent on other people?

responses: One must be self empowered in all aspects of life ,being emotionally independent is very necessary,This can be achieved by becoming self -aware,understanding your loneliness and your needs.Meditaton can be an significant step  in this direction

patterms: I want to get rid of the intoxicants
I want to quit smoking how can I?
Drinking problem how to quit it
responses: If you are really going through this problem,It should be addressed as soon as possible.The more you delay it,the worse it will become.Seek help immediately.Seek a helping group and stay away from friends/people who encourage this activity.Uou should Consider helping yourself on high priority coz thse addictions will eventually ruin your life.

patterms: How to deal with this negativity?
responses: You can consider staying away from the content which you feel is negative.
The more you give attention to the negative thought ,the more it will grow!
You might need to analyze that is the thought really negative? Or you might be averse from it for some reason.You really need to look into those negative thoughts and feelings honestly.
